transport.question: I go on the road and take you places. I have wheels and an engine. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You see many of me parked in parking lots.
👪 Families often use me to travel.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I float on water and can take you across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I'm bigger than a toy duck in the bathtub.
⚓️ I often have an anchor.
🚢 People go on cruises with me.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far, far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I'm much bigger than a bird.
✈️ I have wings.
💺 You sit down inside of me to travel.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can carry many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special road only I can use.
🚏 You wait for me at a station.
🚃 I have many carriages.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use pedals to move me. What am I?

hints.text: ⛑️ It's good to wear a helmet when using me.
🚲 You use pedals to make me go.
🔔 I often have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that helps people who are sick or hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren and flashing lights.
🏥 You might see me outside a hospital.
🚑 I get to go first when there's traffic.

transport.question: I carry things like toys and food, and I'm bigger than a car. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I help deliver packages to your home.
🚚 I am a big type of motor vehicle
🛣️ You see me on the highway a lot.

transport.question: I’m like a bicycle, but you don’t have to pedal. What am I?

hints.text: 🛴 You stand on me to ride.
👧 Many kids use me on the sidewalk.
🦶 You kick to make me move.

transport.question: I fly, but I'm not an airplane. I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
🚨 You might see one helping people in trouble.
🕹️ The blades help me go forward.

transport.question: I am a very fast train that goes underground in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I travel in tunnels.
🏙️ You often find me in big cities.
⏱️ I help people get around quickly.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Sometimes cows eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am short and cover the ground.
⚽️ You can play on me.
🐄 Animals like to eat me.

plant.question: I have a trunk and leaves and I can be very tall. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am big and strong.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in a garden.
🌹 I can be red, yellow, pink, or many colors.
💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. Sometimes I have seeds inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I can be a snack.
🥗 You can put me in a salad.
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.

plant.question: I have prickly thorns, but I grow beautiful flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🥀 I am often red and given as a gift.
⚠️ Be careful when you touch me!
🌹 I am a symbol of love.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange.
🐰 I am a popular snack for bunnies.
👁️ Some people say I'm good for your eyes.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥥 I have water inside.
🌴 I grow on a palm tree.
🐒 Monkeys like to break me open.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with yellow kernels that you can eat. People make popcorn from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow on a stalk.
🍿 You can make a tasty treat from me.
🦃 I am often harvested in the fall.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a big plant. I am used to make flour for bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am often grown in fields.
🍞 I can be ground into flour.
🦆 Ducks like to eat me in the field

plant.question: I am a plant with big leaves that are used to make tea. What am I?

hints.text: 🍵 You can drink something made from my leaves.
🍃 My leaves can be green or black.
🌍 I am grown in many countries around the world.
